original: 扶風茂陵人，東漢經學大家馬融之女、袁隗之妻。有才辯，《列女傳》中便記載其與夫君辯論對答的軼事。
text: A native of Fufeng Maoling, the daughter of Ma Rong, the master of the Eastern Han Confucian classics, and the wife of Yuan Wei. Talented to argue, the "Biography of a Woman" records anecdotes about his debate and answer with his husband.
